title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in library file.
2. Select the label item in library outline view.
OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, it is not possible to do so.
EB: The item should be selectable when it is selected for the first time in the library outline view.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Add a label in library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Try to select the label item in the outline view and observe that it cannot be selected.
